translation.en: [woman 2] Honey, this is just what labor feels like, okay?
[woman 2] There's nothing wrong. You're fine. It's all in your head.
translation.ko: 이상할 거 없어요, 괜찮아요 그냥 과민 반응이에요

translation.en: [doctor] You had a complex delivery, Ms. May.
You lost a near-fatal amount of blood, and we nearly lost you.
translation.ko: 출혈이 너무 심해서 하마터면 큰일 날 뻔했죠

translation.en: -[grunts] -I'll give you something to relax. Okay?
-No, I want to see my baby. -Go to sleep.
I want to see my baby.
[nurse] The bleeding should ease up within two weeks.
If it doesn't, give us a call, okay?
And make sure that you take these meds only as instructed.
translation.ko: 이 약은 꼭 설명한 대로 복용하시고요

translation.en: I have been ringing and ringing, but you know that. [scoffs]
translation.ko: - 엄마? - 전화를 그렇게 해댔는데 알면서 안 받았네

translation.en: What you trying to do? Snatch your body back?
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 다시 몸 만들려고?

translation.en: And why is the door unlocked? Come here.
translation.ko: 문은 왜 안 잠갔어? 이리 와봐

translation.en: What do you mean, he left?
Gemina, why didn't you say something?
It's fine. I'm fine. It probably should have happened a long time ago.
translation.ko: 난 괜찮아요, 진작 끝나야 할 관계였는지도 몰라요

translation.en: Probably! But you thought Shawn shit ice cream.
translation.ko: 그럴지도 모르지 근데 넌 숀이라면 사족을 못 썼잖아

translation.en: losing the baby was a blessing.
And it should never have happened. None of it.
That's why I had you guys at home.
translation.ko: 그래서 내가 너희를 집에서 낳은 거야

translation.en: We pulled you out with our four hands.
translation.ko: 우리 두 사람 손으로 너희를 꺼냈어

translation.en: -Your daddy just stood and watched. -Stood and watched.
translation.ko: - 네 아빠는 멀뚱히 보기만 하고 - 멀뚱히 보기만 했죠

translation.en: And I told you what to do!
-Shawn wanted to go to the hospital. -[mom] Shawn was not having a baby.
translation.ko: - 숀이 병원에 가길 원했어요 - 숀이 낳는 거 아니잖아

translation.en: I'm in awe of you, Gemina.
[nurse] Make sure that you take these meds only as instructed. Got it?
translation.ko: 이 약은 꼭 설명한 대로 복용하시고요, 아셨죠?

translation.en: [doctor] This is why I stressed the importance of great self-care.
translation.ko: 이래서 몸을 잘 챙기라고 그렇게 강조했던 겁니다

translation.en: Pregnant women have all kinds of symptoms.
[doctor] Preeclampsia can go undetected until it's too late.
translation.ko: 임신 중독증은 너무 늦게 발견되기도 해요

translation.en: [Gemina] Why didn't you listen to me?
[man on recording] Hey, Gemina, it's James.
I'm just calling you back. Again. Um…
Yeah, I ran into your mom.
Just hit me back when you get a chance.
How did you get in here?
Come on. Go to your own home.
[Gemina] I told you about the bleeding.
I told you about the pain. You weren't listening--
translation.ko: 통증도 있다고 했고요 제 말을 안 들으셨…

translation.en: I know you have a high-pressure job, travel a lot--
translation.ko: 직업상 스트레스가 심하고 여행도 많이 다니시니까…

translation.en: I told you something wasn't right.
[doctor] Now I'm going to ask you to please stay calm.
Being disrespectful is not gonna help anything, Gemma.
translation.ko: 저한테 따진다고 해결되는 건 없어요, 제마

translation.en: [Gemina] This is why you don't have glass in the shower, Gemina.
translation.ko: 이래서 샤워 부스에 유리를 두면 안 되는데

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, it's me. It's James.
Right. Oh my God. I'm sorry.
[chuckling] You scared the shit out of me.
You said you was freaked out, but the front door was unlocked.
At least, I… I thought I did.
Well, you get a low score for security, Gem.
-It's okay. It's okay. It's okay. -I'm a mess.
-[James] You're fine. -I don't know what's happening to me.
[James] I'm here. How about I get you a glass of water?
I think… I think someone's trying to kill me.
translation.ko: 누가 날 죽이려고 하는 것 같아

translation.en: To kill you? Who? Like, what are you talking about?
translation.ko: 널 죽이려고 한다고? 누가? 무슨 소리야?

translation.en: -Why would you say something like that? -James. My face.
translation.ko: - 왜 그런 말을 해? - 내 얼굴을 봐

translation.en: I'm right here, man, and I ain't going nowhere.
translation.ko: 내가 있잖아, 나 아무 데도 안 가

translation.en: So, if you need me to take a look around,
There, coast is clear. There's no one in here.
Mmm. Searching the house like I was FBI.
-Come here. I know what this is. -What… What is?
translation.ko: - 이리 와, 나도 다 알아 - 뭘?

translation.en: I'm the hero, and you're the damsel in distress.
translation.ko: 난 영웅, 넌 곤경에 처한 여자지

translation.en: [sighs] Come on, stop playing. -Come here. -Hey, stop.
translation.ko: - 장난치지 말고 이리 와 - 하지 마

translation.en: Look, I know you're lonely. I'm lonely too.
Are you ser-- You're a fucking psycho.
[splutters] Hold on. Seriously. What are you talking about?
James, I thought we were just friends.
translation.ko: 제임스, 난 우리가 그냥 친구라고 생각했어

translation.en: You want to sit here and tell me you… you don't know what's up?
translation.ko: 이제 와서 모르는 척 시치미 떼는 거야?

translation.en: Bit of advice? Lock your fucking door.
translation.ko: 충고 하나 하자, 문 좀 잠가

translation.en: ♪ I fear that everything is happening In this world ♪
♪ Some days it brings me to my knees ♪
